caption.p: ( a– c). Transverse sections of a leaf bud ( a), a full-expanded leaf ( b) and a young stem ( c) showing the distribution pattern of the secretory cells (arrows and asterisks). Toluidine Blue. ( d– f). Transverse sections of full-expanded leaves: primary fluorescence under UV light ( d), notice the two-layered cell wall (arrows); Ruthenium Red test on the secretory cell walls (arrows) ( e); primary fluorescence under Blue light ( f). Scale bars = 200 µm ( a); 100 µm ( c); 50 µm ( b, d– f).
